Header: Troops Clean Diyatalawa Town & Its Suburbs
Content: A ‘Shramadana’ campaign to beautify Diyatalawa town and its environs was launched by troops of the Security Forces Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) on the instructions and the supervision of the Commander, Security Forces - Central (SF-Cen), Major General Rukmal Dias on Tuesday (7). Two Officers and 130 Other Rankers of the SFHQ-Cen attended the project with its under command formations and cleaned the areas, including Diyatalawa town, Haputale and Y junction.
